# Extras API

This page documents the extra adapters provided by pydapter.

## Excel Adapter

::: pydapter.extras.excel_
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_source: true

## Pandas Adapter

::: pydapter.extras.pandas_
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_source: true
